CustomField.description:
Formatted Claim Number, which gives information on Line of Business and Date
{Country Code}{SectorShortCode}-{YYYYMMDD}-{CaseNumber}
CAC‌OM-20181108-00001
USR‌ES-20181108-00002
Europe not in scope now, but can be added in the future
If there is a parent case, the claim number will be inherited from the parent.
CLAIMSV2-891 (21-05-2020)-( added "Decra", "DEC") to the formula
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(ParentId) , ( TEXT(Account.BillingCountryCode) & CASE( Sector__c, "Decra", "DEC", "Blair", "BLR", "Hyload", "HYL", "Commercial", "COM", "RES" ) & "-" & TEXT( YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) ) & IF( MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) < 10, '0' + TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) ) & IF( DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) < 10, '0' + TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) ) & "-" & CaseNumber ), Parent.Claim_Number__c )
CustomField.label: Generated Claim Number
